# Training Information

The goal of this workshop is to equip participants with the ability to recognize and produce data visualizations in accordance with the best practices of the field. Looking forward to meeting you all!

## Venue

The workshop takes place at the **Kigali Marriott Hotel in Kigali, Rwanda on the 19th April**.

## Before the workshop

Please try to have these installed before the training, if you have any trouble installing we will have a station on 18th April where you can come for assistance (The steps migt take approximately 15 minutes).
         
a.  [Install R](https://gloriasalome20.github.io/Principles-and-Practice-of-Data-Visualization-in-R/Getting_started_with_R.html#installing-r)

b.  [Install and setup RStudio Desktop](https://gloriasalome20.github.io/Principles-and-Practice-of-Data-Visualization-in-R/Getting_started_with_R.html#install-and-setup-rstudio-desktop)

c.  [libraries](https://gloriasalome20.github.io/Principles-and-Practice-of-Data-Visualization-in-R/Getting_started_with_R.html#installing-r-packages)


::: callout-tip
### note

-   All software used in this workshop are free.
-   If you have any difficulties with the installation, support can be provided on the first day of the AMMnet meeting or before the session or during breaks.
:::
